title: Is Jordan Peterson a Racist or an Anti-christ or a Christian?
description:
Maybe your mama is a racist or an anti-Christ or Christian? How can you tell? What would you or should you do about it? 

Link list on the NY Review of Books https://paulvanderklay.me/2018/03/20/jbp-in-ny-review-of-books-wow/ 

Is Jordan Peterson the Anti-Christ? http://st-eutychus.com/2018/is-jordan-peterson-the-antichrist/ 

How to Think by Alan Jacobs https://www.amazon.com/How-Think-Survival-Guide-World/dp/0451499603/
